name: ROM CONQRR
description:
Made in a couple days for the RemakeJam, ended up using these diversifiers:

  • Reboot
  • Futurist
  • Take a Stand
  • Accessible* (maybe, I haven't made WebGL builds before in Unity so no promises)

For details on the old game I made here is a little twitter thread: https://twitter.com/peterMarti...

Font is here: http://www.dafont.com/bugsmirc...

Using Bfxr for fx sounds

Game music is Airship[loop] by Visager, album available here: http://freemusicarchive.org/mu...
